notes: Increases attack damage by an average of 37.5%.
The proc chances of multiple critical strike sources stack. If two sources of critical strike proc at the same time, the higher multiplier has priority.
If two sources of critical strike proc at the same time, the higher multiplier has priority.
Does not work against wards, buildings, and allied units.
abilities.description: Grants each attack a 30% chance to deal 225% damage.

name: Daedalus
description: A weapon of incredible power that is difficult for even the strongest of warriors to control.
trivia: In the original DotA, this item was called the "Buriza-Do Kyanon", a reference to a weapon (unique ballista) in Diablo II. "Buriza-do Kyanon" is the romaji transliteration of "Blizzard Cannon" when written in Japanese katakana.

Daedalus is the Latin transcription of the Greek "Daidalos" which means "clever worker" in Ancient Greek and Daedalus is also one of the characters in Ovid's "Metamorphoses" who was a skillful craftsman artisan, and the father of Icarus.
